relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley accuses Fred of writing a new order form for Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes.
Fred and George are brothers, as mentioned in the conversation.
Mr. Weasley is traveling to his home, as indicated by his hand moving from 'work' to 'traveling' and then stopping on 'home'.
Fred mentions that if the Hogwarts Express crashed, it would affect his mother.
